title: âš¡ Transmit content from any Contentful type to Algolia indexes
abstract:
I've written a transmitter which collects data from [Contentful](https://www.contentful.com/) and indexes it in [Algolia](https://www.algolia.com/). It is written in Node.js and really simple.
The application syncs content between Contentful and Algolia. You can configure the service to run with Drafts (Preview API) from Contentful and put it in different indexes in Algolia.
meta-description: A Node.js transmitter which collects data from Contentful and indexes it in Algolia.
